channel.title: Toronto Mesh
channel.description: We help communities create better networks with open source and peer-to-peer technologies that promote digital literacy and privacy.

item.title: Virtual Meet and Greet
item.description:
Join us at 7:00pm on May 28, 2020 to chat with members of Toronto Mesh! We will talk about our current projects and how you can contribute. We will meet at online at https://bbb.hypha.coop/b/tom-ygc-ttm.

Our regular meetup venue Free Geek Toronto is currently accepting donations as they have been forced to close the majority of their operations due to COVID-19.

Planning on coming? Let us know through our chat channel or email us at hello@tomesh.net.

This event has a code of conduct.

item.title: Virtual Meet and Greet
item.description:
Join us at 7:00pm on April 30, 2020 to chat with members of Toronto Mesh! We will talk about our current projects and how you can contribute. We will meet at online at https://bbb.hypha.coop/b/tom-ygc-ttm.

Our regular meetup venue Free Geek Toronto is currently accepting donations as they have been forced to close the majority of their operations due to COVID-19.

Planning on coming? Let us know through our chat channel or email us at hello@tomesh.net.

This event has a code of conduct.

item.title: Community Infrastructure Learning Group
item.description:
Looking to build on last meeting by scoping out some projects related to the short term road map. Namely the pub setup script, the accompanying docs, and blog/tutorial style walk through.

These seem interconnected enough that it might be good to scope them out together. Open to feedback on this during the week leading up to Saturday.

All skill levels welcome and wanted.

Topic: Community Infrastructure Learning Group
Time: Jan 11, 2020 02:00 PM Eastern Time (US and Canada)
        Every 2 weeks on Sat, until Apr 4, 2020, 7 occurrence(s)
        Jan 25, 2020 02:00 PM
        Feb 8, 2020 02:00 PM

item.title: Meet and Greet (Canceled)
item.description:
This meeting has been canceled due to COVID-19 as advised by Toronto Public Health.

Visit us on our matrix chat instead!

We will resume meet-ups after things have settled down.

item.title: Meet and Greet
item.description:
Join us at 7:00pm on February 27, 2020 for some face time with members of Toronto Mesh! We will talk about our current projects and how you can contribute. We will meet at Free Geek Toronto, 180 Sudbury St.

Do you have any e-waste you would like to donate to Free Geek? Bring it! See their list of accepted electronics here.

Planning on coming? Let us know through our chat channel or email us at hello@tomesh.net.

This event has a code of conduct.
